attributes.Site_Detai: Access road is located on top of  the existing dike north of the CDF running east/west.
attributes.Site_Det_2: CDF located along navigation channel allowing access by water transportation.
attributes.Comments:
Newer disposed material is suitable for near shore nourishment.
Older disposed material is not suitable for near shore nourishment.
Metals present in older material.

attributes.Site_Detai: Next to port facilities that regularly ship steel and other products in and out via semi.
attributes.Site_Det_1: The port facilities also have access by rail.  This is not as frequently used, but there is a railroad very close to the CDF.
attributes.Site_Det_2: CDF is built out into lake Michigan.  Water access on 2 sides.
attributes.Comments: Metals and PCB's
attributes.Add_CofC_C: See list for Calumet Harbor and River.  There also was some material from the Chicago River placed in this cdf that contained a lot of PCB's.

attributes.Site_Detai: Access road is located off of Old North River Drive and circles the perimeter of the CDF.
attributes.Comments: Organic Compounds are present.

attributes.Site_Detai: Access road is located off of South River Drive east of parking lot near entrance of Clinton River.  The road circles the perimeter of the CDF.
attributes.Site_Det_2: CDF located along navigation channel allowing access by water transportation.

attributes.Site_Detai: Access road is located east of Jefferson Avenue. The road circles the perimeter of the CDF.

attributes.Site_Detai: Roads run very close to the site.  Main highways and roads run very close to the CDF.
